title: [StatusQ tests] Random failures on TestStatusQ::SubscriptionBroker::test_periodic_request_multiple_subscriptions

labels.name: E:Desktop Bugfixes 0.16
labels.description: Misc bug fixes in Desktop app overall for 0.16

body:
### Description

Investigate and fix test_periodic_request_multiple_subscriptions test failures. It could be related to the CPU stress when the test is running. This test relies on a timer that fires every 50ms and accepts a delay of 30ms for the qt timer. But probably under CPU stress the Timer fires with a higher delay.

